message:

## ğŸŒ¸ Weekly Update - 2026-02-16

We've been busy bees building tools to help you build better. Here's the fresh honey from this week:

**ğŸ¦ OpenClaw Meets Pollinations**
The autonomous agent framework **OpenClaw** just got the full Pollinations treatment! We've shipped a new landing page, auto-onboarding scripts, and fresh branding. It's never been easier to spin up your own AI agents and let them roam free.

**ğŸ­ New Model: Qwen Character**
Storytellers and roleplayers, this one's for you. We've added `qwen-character` to the text rosterâ€”it's optimized for deep personality consistency and narrative flow. (We also did some spring cleaning and removed the unstable flux-2-dev).

**ğŸ“š Docs ğŸ¤ Playground**
Why switch tabs when you can just scroll? We've merged the **Docs** directly into the **Play page**. Now you can grab integration code and test it immediately in the same window. Maximum flow state unlocked.

**ğŸ›¡ï¸ Polly Power-Up**
We've hardened our resident AI, Polly, against prompt leakage. She's just as friendly as ever, but much better at keeping secrets and staying secure.

Go build something magical! ğŸŒ¸
image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot standing in front of a wooden RPG quest board in a sunny digital garden. The board displays three retro parchment notices with chunky pixel text: 'OPENCLAW', 'QWEN CHAR', and 'LIVE DOCS'. A large wooden sign above reads 'WEEKLY BUZZ'. The bee wears a tiny adventurer's cape and holds a pixelated map. Cozy 8-bit pixel art aesthetic. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Chunky retro sprites. Nostalgic, emotionally warm, celebratory atmosphere.
reasoning: This update balances a major integration (OpenClaw) with immediate user value (new models, better UX). The 'Weekly Buzz' RPG quest board theme fits the gamified/community vibe of Discord perfectly.
